data.name: PSYCRON Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The soundtrack to PSYCRON, a 2D action Metroidvania where you try and escape the deep space scientific research vessel CEREMOS. Listen to 16 wildly different tracks as you sit in your chair, drive a car, or take public transportation!
data.about_the_game: The soundtrack to PSYCRON, a 2D action Metroidvania where you try and escape the deep space scientific research vessel CEREMOS. Listen to 16 wildly different tracks as you sit in your chair, drive a car, or take public transportation!
data.short_description: The full PSYCRON Original Soundtrack album, featuring a bonus cut track and extended arrangements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 42 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 448 MB available space
